unsolved: cross-device development; flexibility of architecture; abstractions
device_mount: Placed loosely around user (e.g., table); Handheld
scale: Near, personal space; Social space; Room
evaluation: User study (quantitative, controlled lab experiment); User study (qualitative); Deployment with developers
contribution_desc: A kinect based framework for rapid development of cross-device interactions and applications supporting full-body interactions. Two sample applications are presented and a user study with 12 developers accessing the ease of use is conducted.
